forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and patchy fog. Cloudy. Low around 53, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. South southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Light Rain then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain before 8am, then a chance of rain showers between 8am and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. South wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 52 overnight. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 50. West northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 4am, then freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 35. East wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before midnight, then freezing rain and rain showers between midnight and 3am, then snow showers and sleet and freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 25, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Northeast wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. North wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain. Cloudy. Low around 28, with temperatures rising to around 30 overnight. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 7am, then freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a high near 39. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 1am, then freezing rain and rain showers between 1am and 4am, then freezing rain and a slight chance of sleet between 4am and 5am, then snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 28 overnight. Northeast wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers before 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to heavy ice on the chairlifts and slopes. 

We plan to open tomorrow morning for skiing and riding at 9:00 AM if the weather allows. 

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
